author: Deccan
title: Advent launches new Bluetooth speaker
text:
Deccan Chronicle | September 04, 2015, 17.57 pm Advent ET-01 BUTF Bluetooth speaker is priced at Rs 1,299 Advent has launched its new maiden Bluetooth speaker, the ET-01 BUTF, with blue LED Eyes. It carries an ETA certification from the WPC. Portable and lightweight, the Advent ET-01 BUTF easily pairs with any Bluetooth device and offers a wide coverage of up to 8-10 metres.
The inbuilt microphone allows one to make hands free calls. So, sit back and relax! The speaker supports a microSD slot of upto 32GB and features both card and aux playability. The FM radio function is the icing on the cake for all radio lovers. Go ahead and tune in to those prank call jokes on FM.
Priced at Rs 1,299, the product comes with a warranty of 12 months and will be available on Flipkart, Snapdeal, Amazon, Paytm, E-bay and Shopclues.com.
